Package org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.main Description

Main schema validation API

This package contains all classes you will use to validate your inputs:

  • start by creating a JsonSchemaFactory,
  • customize it if need be (by adding new keywords, removing existing ones, etc),
  • register a schema,
  • create a schema instance,
  • validate your inputs.

A single JsonSchema instance can validate as many inputs as required. What is more, it is fully thread safe.
